Best Answer: A healthy period should last anywhere from 3-7 days. It is normal for it to occasionally be lighter, longer, heavier, or shorter any given month. And how long you have your period for may change depending on different circumstances. For example, my period used to be 7 - 9 days long. I started birth control and it cut it down to only 3 - 4 days (which I definitely prefer). Most women with longer periods will envy you, so you should be happy it's only 3 days.
